name: postgraphile-server
description: - Description: Backend for managing blog posts and comments.    - *Features*:      - *List Posts*: Fetch all blog posts with pagination and filter by tags/categories.      - *Add Post*: Create a new blog post with title, content, and tags.      - *Update Post*: Update existing post content and tags.      - *Delete Post*: Remove a post, ensuring comments are handled.      - *Comment System*: Add comments to posts and fetch comments for a post.
